input.system_prompt:
You are an AI assistant evaluating product relevancy.
Your goal is to determine how relevant a list of competitor products are to a specific reference product, based on names and descriptions.
Output the scores as a JSON object containing a single key 'scores', which is an array of objects. Each object in the array must have 'competitor_product_name' (the exact competitor product name provided in the input), 'relevancy_score' (an integer 1-10), and 'rationale' (a brief explanation for the score).

The relevancy scale is 1-10:
- 1: Not relevant at all.
- 10: Identical product.

Important scoring guidelines:
- Focus on product function, features, silhouette, and construction
- DO NOT emphasize color or pattern when scoring, as the reference product may encompass a wide range of colors/patterns not specified
- Consider the core product type, shape, materials, and intended use
- Evaluate if the products serve similar purposes and would appeal to similar customers
- Ensure every competitor product listed receives a score.
input.user_prompt:
Reference Brand: "Timex"
Reference Product Name: "Expedition Scout"
Reference Product Description:
The Expedition Titanium is ready to go the distance, living up to the Timex legacy of fully equipping you for your adventures ahead while embodying the kind of tradition you can wear every day. Its key feature is its shock-resistant 38mm case rendered in true titanium, offering incredible durability while ensuring a comfortably lightweight feel on the wrist. Reinforcing its 200m water resistance are a screw-down crown and screw-on caseback that effectively keep water out, while the light gray dial features a date window at 3 o'clock and luminescent hands and hour markers for enhanced visibility in lowlight conditions. Clean and modern, itâ€™s powered by a reliable quartz movement and features a sapphire crystal for optimal clarity, a sturdy crown protector, and a smooth grain Italian leather strap ethically sourced from and gold-rated by the Leather Working Group (LWG) and complete with contrast side stitches.

Competitor Products to Evaluate (Max 25):
  - Name='Timex Expedition Rugged Core Analog Field Watch'
  - Name='Timex Men's Expedition Scout Watch'
  - Name='Men's Timex Expedition Field Watch'
  - Name='Timex Expedition Overstripe Watch'
  - Name='Timex Expedition Field Date Watch'
  - Name='Men's Timex Expedition Scout 40mm'
  - Name='Timex Men's Expedition Field Metal Brown Leather Strap Watch T443819J'
  - Name='Fossil Men's Sport Tourer Chronograph Watch FS6047'
  - Name='Men's Hamilton Watches Khaki Field Titanium Auto 36mm Limited Edition Engineered Garments H70235130'
  - Name='Tissot Men's Seastar 2000 Professional Powermatic 80'
  - Name='Seiko 5 Sports SBSA017 Men's'
  - Name='SEIKO SBSA121 SEIKO 5 SPORTS FIELD SPORTS STYLE Black Men's Watch in Box'
  - Name='Seiko Men's 5 Automatic SNKL45 Watch'
  - Name='Seiko Men's 5 Automatic SRPD76K1'
  - Name='Men's Seiko 5 Sports Watch'
  - Name='Fossil Men's Privateer Chronograph'
  - Name='Skagen Watches'
  - Name='Orient Men's Automatic Watch RA-AA0C05L19B'
  - Name='Citizen Men's Eco-Drive Chandler Watch'
  - Name='Seiko Men's Series 5 Automatic Black Dial Watch SNK607'
  - Name='Lorus By Seiko Men's V733-8a10 Quartz Day Date Field Watch'
  - Name='Fossil Outlet Men's Privateer Chronograph Stainless Steel Watch'
  - Name='Tissot PRX Watch'
  - Name='Seiko Alba Field Gear Military Watch'
  - Name='Casio Men's Digital Watch'

Based on the reference product description and each competitor product's name, please provide the relevancy score for *each* competitor product using the 1-10 scale. Remember to focus on product features, silhouette, and construction rather than color or pattern. Return the results in the specified JSON format (an object with a 'scores' array, where each item has 'competitor_product_name', 'relevancy_score', and 'rationale' explaining why you assigned that score).

scores.description: An array of relevancy scores for the competitor products.

competitor_product_name.description: The exact name of the competitor product as provided in the input.

rationale.description: Brief explanation for why this score was assigned.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Timex Expedition Rugged Core Analog Field Watch
scores_with_rationales.rationale: This is a Timex Expedition analog field watch likely similar in function, style, and intended use, though not identical to the titanium model in the reference.
Very close to the reference product by name and type, a Timex Expedition Scout analog watch; likely very similar in design and features but may differ in materials or water resistance.
Also a Timex Expedition field watch, shares core product type and brand, but might differ in case material or specific features from the titanium model.
Another Timex Expedition model likely sharing analog field watch characteristics, but the 'Overstripe' name suggests differences in dial or strap design, possibly less technical features.
Shares brand, model line, field watch type, and includes date function as does reference, likely similar but possibly different materials or water resistance.
Very similar, likely just a variation in size of the Expedition Scout; close in style, features, and purpose to the reference product.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Timex Men's Expedition Field Metal Brown Leather Strap Watch T443819J
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Timex Expedition field metal watch with leather strap, close to the reference watch in construction and style though likely differs in case material (probably steel vs. titanium) and possibly water resistance.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Fossil Men's Sport Tourer Chronograph Watch FS6047
scores_with_rationales.rationale: While a men's sport chronograph watch, Fossil is a different brand and chronograph function and style may differ from rugged field style referenced; less aligned in core features.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Men's Hamilton Watches Khaki Field Titanium Auto 36mm Limited Edition Engineered Garments H70235130
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Hamilton Khaki Field Titanium Automatic watch is very similar in construction (titanium), style (field watch), and purpose (rugged, durable) to the reference Timex Expedition Titanium.
This is a professional dive watch with more focus on diving capabilities and higher water resistance, differing from casual field watch style and functions.
A Seiko 5 Sports model, likely a rugged sports watch with automatic movement; shares some features like durability and sport use but probably differs in field watch styling and materials.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: SEIKO SBSA121 SEIKO 5 SPORTS FIELD SPORTS STYLE Black Men's Watch in Box
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Specifically labeled 'Field Sports Style', this Seiko 5 Sports watch is quite similar in design concept and use case to the reference field watch.
A Seiko 5 automatic watch likely more general purpose than rugged field style; may lack shock resistance or titanium construction.
Similar to above; a Seiko 5 automatic wristwatch with possible sport styling but less focused on rugged field watch purpose.
A line of sports watches from Seiko; potentially rugged and casual but may not specifically align with titanium field watch criteria.
Another Fossil chronograph more fashion-oriented and less field-rugged style, lower relevance for features and construction.
Skagen watches typically feature minimalist Scandinavian designs focused on style, often lacking rugged field watch features or titanium construction.
An Orient automatic watch can be durable and sport-styled but may differ in specific construction or field watch attributes.
Citizen Eco-Drive Chandler is a field watch style with eco-drive quartz movement, durable and casual; reasonably relevant but construction materials may differ.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Seiko Men's Series 5 Automatic Black Dial Watch SNK607
scores_with_rationales.rationale: A Seiko 5 Series automatic watch, generally casual/sport style but may not prioritize titanium or shock resistance specifically.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Lorus By Seiko Men's V733-8a10 Quartz Day Date Field Watch
scores_with_rationales.rationale: A quartz day-date field watch aligns fairly well in function and styling though likely lower-end materials than titanium.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Fossil Outlet Men's Privateer Chronograph Stainless Steel Watch
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Another Fossil chronograph with stainless steel, less aligned with rugged field watch style and titanium case.
Tissot PRX is a dressy sports watch with integrated bracelet, less rugged field watch style or titanium construction.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Seiko Alba Field Gear Military Watch
scores_with_rationales.rationale: This Alba Field Gear watch is designed as a military/field watch, matching well in use case and style though possibly differing in materials.
A digital watch generally differs in style and functionality from this analog titanium field watch; less relevant apart from outdoor use.
